entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
